mapper.update: UPDATE review SET custid = #{custid}, storeid = #{storeid}, revtext = #{revtext}, star = #{star} WHERE reviewid = #{reviewid}
mapper.select: select s.storename, o.reservedate, r.revtext, r.star from review r inner join cust c on c.custid = r.custid inner join store s on s.storeid = r.storeid inner join orderlist o on o.custid = c.custid where c.custid = #{custid};
